prompt: Create a cube in Blender using Python
Create a sphere and apply a glossy material
completion:
import bpy
bpy.ops.mesh.primitive_uv_sphere_add(radius=1)
mat = bpy.data.materials.new(name='Glossy')
mat.use_nodes = True
nodes = mat.node_tree.nodes
glossy = nodes.new('ShaderNodeBsdfGlossy')
mat.node_tree.links.new(glossy.outputs[0], nodes['Material Output'].inputs[0])
bpy.context.active_object.data.materials.append(mat)

prompt: Generate a Blender script that creates a pyramid mesh
completion:
import bpy
import bmesh
mesh = bpy.data.meshes.new('Pyramid')
obj = bpy.data.objects.new('Pyramid', mesh)
bpy.context.collection.objects.link(obj)
bm = bmesh.new()
verts = [bm.verts.new((0,0,1)), bm.verts.new((-1,-1,0)), bm.verts.new((1,-1,0)), bm.verts.new((1,1,0)), bm.verts.new((-1,1,0))]
bm.faces.new((verts[0], verts[1], verts[2]))
bm.faces.new((verts[0], verts[2], verts[3]))
bm.faces.new((verts[0], verts[3], verts[4]))
bm.faces.new((verts[0], verts[4], verts[1]))
bm.faces.new((verts[1], verts[2], verts[3], verts[4]))
bm.to_mesh(mesh)
bm.free()

prompt: Create a material with emission and assign it to the active object
completion:
import bpy
mat = bpy.data.materials.new(name='Emissive')
mat.use_nodes = True
nodes = mat.node_tree.nodes
emission = nodes.new('ShaderNodeEmission')
emission.inputs[1].default_value = 10
mat.node_tree.links.new(emission.outputs[0], nodes['Material Output'].inputs[0])
bpy.context.active_object.data.materials.append(mat)

prompt: Animate a cube moving along the X axis
completion:
import bpy
obj = bpy.context.active_object
obj.location.x = 0
obj.keyframe_insert(data_path='location', frame=1)
obj.location.x = 5
obj.keyframe_insert(data_path='location', frame=50)

prompt: Create a Blender script that adds a subdivision modifier
completion:
import bpy
obj = bpy.context.active_object
subdiv = obj.modifiers.new(name='Subdiv', type='SUBSURF')
subdiv.levels = 3
